context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore different options like reaching out to the drug manufacturing company for any patient assistance programs, researching any available grant programs or charities that could help, asking for a generic version of the drug or seeking a second opinion about other treatment options
explore every available avenue to secure the medication his wife needs
contact the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication
consult professionals or organizations dedicated to helping people in such predicaments
explore all possible options to obtain the medication
explore various assistance options

consult with the doctor about more affordable alternatives or medications, and explore options such as patient assistance programs, generic drug options, or help from non-profit organizations aimed at helping individuals with medical expenses

consider exploring various options such as speaking to the doctor about potential alternatives, appealing to the insurance company for coverage, looking into patient assistance programs that provide help to those unable to afford their medications, fundraising online or within his community, or seeking loans or financial assistance from family and friends

consider exploring various options such as setting up a crowdfunding campaign to help gather the money needed for the medication, apply for assistance programs that provide support for expensive medications, negotiate the price with the pharmaceutical company directly, or consult her doctor for any cheaper alternatives or clinical trial options
explore all possible options to secure the funds

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, Uber, or any other type of ride-hailing service to get to the airport as quickly as possible while he arranges for his car to be towed or repaired
call for roadside assistance or a tow truck
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service as soon as possible
call for roadside assistance or a tow truck and simultaneously arrange for a taxi, Uber, or Lyft to pick him up from the breakdown location and take him to the airport
call a taxi service, Uber, or other rideshare app to get to the airport as quickly as possible
contact a towing or roadside assistance service to help fix the breakdown or transport his vehicle
call a taxi, Uber or another ride-share service to quickly arrange alternative transportation to the airport
call for a taxi, rideshare, or ask a friend to come pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber or other ride service to get to the airport as quickly as possible
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to help him get to the airport on time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: check if there are any mistakes in calculations or transactions that could have resulted in the missing amount
check the receipts and transactions made during his shift
double check all of the receipts and transactions made that day to see if there was a mistake made somewhere
thoroughly double check all the sales receipts, records, and cash in the register again
inform his supervisor or the owner of the bakery about the missing money instead of trying to cover the loss himself
carefully review receipts and transactions of the day
check the sales records and compare them with the cash in the register
thoroughly check his surroundings, receipts, and bookkeeping entries to see if there was an error in counting or reporting
double check the register and transaction records
retrace his steps and review the transactions during his shift

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: stay in one spot
gather his friends and try to find a sheltered area to stay in and keep warm

stay in one place to increase his chances of being found by the rescue crew
stay put and try to make their location visible to rescuers
stay calm and make sure everyone else remains calm
